Html:
Hi

Firstly, great plugin. Thanks for sharing it.

I would like to be able to have the colour of the stars change depending on the rating.
E.g. 1-5 Stars = Red, 5-8 Stars = Orange, 8-10 Stars = Green.

Would this be achievable?

Thanks

No problem at all. Just swap out the gif image file with a new one. This one should, instead of containing just one star per line, contain the 10 colored stars per line. This does the trick. In the samples , the idea behind it is similar to the one showing the antenna "reception" vertical bars.
